spice: Let's add some spice to your playlists
templates: Create custom playlists based on a pre-set template or create your own, share it and have it voted ⭐
tape: "I got you a tape" but in 2023
tags: That song reminds you of summer? Add the tag "summer" to it and next time you'll search for that tag, you'll see that song
stats: Get a deeper understanding of your music listening habits. Add tags to songs or playlists to make them easier to find. Search for everything inside your playlists  🔎
